caption.title: Luminex MFI values against NiV in Eidolon helvum annobonensis, separated by age and gender.
caption.p: Age is divided into bats of approx. 8 months of age, 20 months of age (including primiparous females) and adults. Graphs are of box and whisker plots showing median (black line), 25th and 75th percentile (box) and 1.5x the interquartile range (dotted line) values.
